title: 岛屿数量 (Number of Islands)
content: 思路: // @Title: 岛屿数量 (Number of Islands) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-01-14 21:29:17 // @Runtime: 4 ms // @Memory: 47.8 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int numIslands(char[][] grid) { int x = 0, y = 0, max = 0; while (x < grid.length) { y=0; while (y < grid[x].length) { Integer size = 0; if (grid[x][y] == '1') { size = dfs(x, y, grid); if(size>0){ max++; } } y++; } x++; } return max; } int dfs(int x, int y, char[][] grid) { int i = 0; if (x >= grid.length || x < 0 || y >= grid[x].length || y < 0) { return 0; } if (grid[x][y] == '1') { i = 1; } else { return 0; } grid[x][y] = '0'; i += dfs(x, y + 1, grid); i += dfs(x + 1, y, grid); i += dfs(x, y - 1, grid); i += dfs(x - 1, y, grid); return i; } }
